name: meta_currency_balance
displayName: Unspent meta currency available for permanent upgrades.

name: meta_currency_total
displayName: Total lifetime meta currency earned across all completed runs.

name: upgrade_move_speed_level
displayName: Permanent upgrade level that increases the player’s base movement speed.

displayName: Permanent upgrade level that increases the player’s base maximum health.

name: upgrade_magnet_radius_level
displayName: Permanent upgrade level that increases the player’s pickup and magnet radius.

name: metaShardsBalance

name: metaShardsTotal
displayName: Lifetime total Shards earned (all-time accumulated shards)

displayName: Level of the Shard Premium upgrade “Damage Amplifier” (permanent damage bonus

displayName: Level of the Shard Premium upgrade “Power Scaler” (permanent scaling bonus for deep runs)

displayName: Level of the Shard Premium upgrade “Value Multiplier” (permanent value/payout multiplier
